mapper.update: UPDATE LESSON_APPLY SET APPLY_PRICE = #{applyPrice}, APPLY_PLAN = #{applyPlan}, APPLY_CONTENT = #{applyContent} WHERE LESSON_NO = #{lessonNo} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LESSON_APPLY WHERE LESSON_NO = #{lessonNo} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM LESSON_APPLY WHERE LESSON_NO = #{lessonNo} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT A.*, L.LESSON_TITLE FROM LESSON_APPLY A JOIN LESSON L ON A.LESSON_NO = L.LESSON_NO WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT A.*, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, L.LESSON_TITLE FROM LESSON_APPLY A JOIN MEMBER M ON A.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN LESSON L ON A.LESSON_NO = L.LESSON_NO WHERE A.LESSON_NO = #{lessonNo}
